schema.name: Please select the area of your activity

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNTF
source(output(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
SrcNTF select(mapColumn(
		INTERVIEW_KEY = interviewkey,
		INTERVIEW_ID = interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = A01,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = A02,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = A03,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = A07,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = A09,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = A10,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = A11,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = A12,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
DISTINCT derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIERWER_NAME,
INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
SUPERVISOR_NAME,
TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
INTERVIEW_DURATION,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIEW_ID)) ~> SourceRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExistingDIM exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH_VALUE,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentTimestamp(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentTimestamp()) ~> RunInfor
RunInfor alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
SelectColumns aggregate(groupBy(INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		FILE_NAME),
	COUNT = count()) ~> DISTINCT
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE = SOURCE_RECORD_HASH,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcSTGNTR
SrcSTGNTR unpivot(output(
		Variables as string,
		Answer_KEY as string
	),
	ungroupBy(ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		A01,
		A02,
		A03,
		A04,
		A06,
		A07,
		A09,
		A10,
		A11,
		A12,
		A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(input(
		{ProjectID|Context|FirmID|Date of data collection|Country|interviewkey|interviewid|A01|A02|A03|A04|A06|A07|A09|A10|A11|A12|A13|B01|B03|B17|BA03|BA04|BA07|BA08|BA11|BA12|BA13|BA14|BA15|BB02|BB08|BB09|BC03|BC04|C04|C05|DA01|DB01|DB02|DB03|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NTF_UNPOVITE.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TrgUnpovitNTR

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNTF
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM1
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(ENTITY_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_ENTITY',
	format: 'query') ~> ExitingDimMaxID
SrcNTF select(mapColumn(
		FIRM_ID = FirmID,
		ENTITY_NAME = A04,
		ADDRESS = A06,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumn
SelectColumn aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> DistinctByAggregate
DistinctByAggregate derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ADDRESS,
FIRM_ID
)) ~> SourceRecordHash
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_ENTITY_NAME = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME,
		EXIST_ADDRESS = ADDRESS,
		EXIST_FIRM_ID = FIRM_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExistingCol
SelectExistingCol derive(RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
EXIST_ADDRESS,
EXIST_FIRM_ID
)) ~> ExstingRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExstingRecordHash exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, ExstingRecordHash lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXIST_ENTITY_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
SurrogateKey1 derive(ENTITY_ID = MAX_VAL+Dim_Surrogate_Key,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXIST_VERSION_NO +1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID,
		ENTITY_NAME),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestEntityID
ExistingDIM, LatestEntityID join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_NAME
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestEntityID@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join2 keyGenerate(output(Dim_Surrogate_Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord, ExitingDimMaxID join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		FIRM_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = EXIST_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		FIRM_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdDIMENTITY

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageNTF
SrcStageNTF derive(NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'NTF/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHNTF

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageOLAC
SrcStageOLAC derive({Year of birth} = case({Year of birth}=='N/A', 
'',
iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth})
),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'OLAC/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		Variables as string,
		Answer_KEY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNtfUNPOVITE
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

source(output(

source(output(

source(output(

		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,

	),

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

source(output(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY as integer,
		VARIABLE_NAME as string,
		SURVEY_QUESTIONIRE_VERSION_NO as string,
		QUENTION_TITLE as string,
		VARIABLE_DESC as string,
		RESPONSE_TYPE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,

	),

		OPTIONS_CODE as string,

		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION
Select1, DIMPROJECT1 lookup(upper(trim(ProjectID)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpPROJECT
LkpPROJECT, DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE1 lookup(upper(trim(Context)) == upper(trim(CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCONTEXT
LkpCONTEXT, DIMCOUNTRY1 lookup(upper(trim(Country)) == upper(trim(COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCOUNTRY
LkpCOUNTRY, DIMSURVEYDETAILS1 lookup(Select1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME
	&& Select1@INTERVIERWER_NAME == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIERWER_NAME
	&& Select1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE
	&& Select1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION
	&& Select1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL
	&& Select1@SUPERVISOR_NAME == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@SUPERVISOR_NAME
	&& Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED
	&& Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED
	&& Select1@INTERVIEW_DURATION == DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEW_DURATION
	&& interviewkey == INTERVIEW_KEY
	&& interviewid == INTERVIEW_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYDETAILS
SrcNtfUNPOVITE select(mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = A01,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = A02,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = A03,
		A04,
		A06,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = A07,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = A09,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = A10,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = A11,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = A12,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		Variables,
		Answer_KEY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
LkpSURVEYDETAILS, DIMSURVEYDATE1 lookup(toDate({Date of data collection},'MM/dd/yyyy') == DATE_TIME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYDATE
LkpSURVEYDATE, DIMSURVEYVARIABLE1 lookup(Variables == VARIABLE_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYVARIABLE
LkpSURVEYVARIABLE, DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1 lookup(Variables == DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1@VARIABLE_NAME
	&& Answer_KEY == OPTIONS_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMPROJECT1
DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE1
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMCOUNTRY1
DIMSURVEYDETAILS select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS1
DIMSURVEYDATE select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDATE1
DIMSURVEYVARIABLE select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME,
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE = RESPONSE_TYPE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLE1
DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY = SURVEY_VARIABLE_OPTION_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME,
		OPTIONS_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1
LkpSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE as integer,
		CHANGE_VALUE as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FACTENTITYSURVEY
